message: Bob, I'm offering you my product at a price of $1000000. It's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While your offer is tempting,  $950000 doesn't quite cover the value I see in this product. I'm willing to come down a bit to $975000. Let's meet in the middle to make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $960000.
